biotools.summary: BioGRID ORCS is an open repository of CRISPR screens compiled through comprehensive curation efforts. Our current index searches more than 49 publications and 58,161 genes to return more than 895 CRISPR screens from 3 major model organism species and 629 cell lines.All screen data are freely provided through our search index and available via download in a wide variety of standardized formats.

bioschemas.name: BioGRID Open Repository of CRISPR Screens (ORCS)
